lead_paragraph: The State of the Art column on Thursday, about a new Panasonic technology that allows compact cameras to take higher-quality pictures, misstated the weight of the company’s DMC-G1 camera, the first to use the new format. It weighs about 13.5 ounces, not 8 ounces.
